EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for contacting YETI!
I am sorry to hear about the issue with your Rambler. It does appear that the added coloring to your Rambler was done through a third party that is unaffiliated with YETI and our manufacturing process. Due to this, we are unable to offer a warranty replacement. The color options available on yeti.com are only the ones covered under our warranty. However, I would be more than happy to offer you a 30% discount on the purchase of a new Rambler 30 from YETI.
In order to get your product exchanged, we recommend reaching out to the original seller as any Rambler products hydro-dipped or powder coated by a third party void the YETI warranty. We cannot guarantee the quality or the safety of the customized product. If you would like to redeem your discount, please give us a call at 512-394-9384 between 8 am and 5:30 pm CST, Monday - Friday, and we would be more than happy to place that order over the phone for you.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
